root.name: SEGA Bass Fishing
root.description: Overview Sega Bass Fishing is a fishing game made by Sega AM1 for the Sega Dreamcast. The game puts the player in the role of a professional fisherman/woman, and given a target 'weight' of bass to catch before the allotted time runs out. Availability The game was later released on the Nintendo Wii, and as part of the Dreamcast Collection on PC and Xbox 360.
